mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.issue_id AS "issueId", a.lock_type AS "lockType", a.title AS "title", a.num AS "num", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO issue_lock( id, issue_id, lock_type, title, num, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{issueId}, #{lockType}, #{title}, #{num}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE issue_lock SET issue_id = #{issueId}, lock_type = #{lockType}, title = #{title}, num = #{num}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
